revision.comment: update FootballDatabase.eu template to use ID that works with new URL, misc formatting
revision.text:
{{Infobox football biography | name = Isaac Mbenza | image = Valenciennes - UNFP FC (02-07-2016) 106.jpg | fullname = Isaac Mbenza{{cite web |url=https://www.premierleague.com/news/844127 |title=2018/19 Premier League squads confirmed |publisher=Premier League |date=3 September 2018 |accessdate=4 September 2018}} | birth_date = {{birth date and age|1996|03|08|df=y}} | birth_place = [[Saint-Denis, Seine-Saint-Denis|Saint-Denis]], France | height = 1.87 m | position = [[Forward (association football)|Forward]] | currentclub = [[Huddersfield Town A.F.C.|Huddersfield Town]]
(on loan from [[Montpellier HSC|Montpellier]]) | clubnumber = 18 | years1 = 2013–2016 | clubs1 = [[Valenciennes FC#Reserve squad|Valenciennes B]] | caps1 = 30 | goals1 = 3 | years2 = 2015–2016 | clubs2 = [[Valenciennes FC|Valenciennes]] | caps2 = 48 | goals2 = 7 | years3 = 2016–2017 | clubs3 = [[Standard Liège]] | caps3 = 21 | goals3 = 1 | years4 = 2017– | clubs4 = [[Montpellier HSC|Montpellier]] | caps4 = 54 | goals4 = 11 | years5 = 2018– | clubs5 = → [[Huddersfield Town A.F.C.|Huddersfield Town]] (loan) | caps5 = 14 | goals5 = 0 | nationalyears1 = 2013 | nationalteam1 = [[Belgium national under-17 football team|Belgium U17]] | nationalcaps1 = 2 | nationalgoals1 = 0 | nationalyears2 = 2015 | nationalteam2 = [[Belgium national under-19 football team|Belgium U19]] | nationalcaps2 = 1 | nationalgoals2 = 0 | nationalyears3 = 2017– | nationalteam3 = [[Belgium national under-21 football team|Belgium U21]] | nationalcaps3 = 12 | nationalgoals3 = 2 | club-update = 10:00, 3 January 2019 (UTC) }} '''Isaac Mbenza''' (born 8 March 1996) is a Belgian professional [[Association football|footballer]] who plays for [[Huddersfield Town A.F.C.|Huddersfield Town]] in the [[Premier League]]. He has also represented the Belgian national youth teams until the [[Belgium national under-21 football team|Belgium U21]]. ==Club career== '''Montpellier''' On 31 January 2017, Mbenza signed for French club [[Montpellier HSC|Montpellier]].{{cite web|url=http://www.standard.be/nouvelles-2/lire/~isaac-mbenza-to-montpellier.htm?lng=en|title=Isaac Mbenza to Montpellier|publisher=Standard Liège|date=30 January 2017|access-date=25 May 2017}}{{cite web|url=http://www.mhscfoot.com/articles/2016-2017/equipe-pro/isaac-mbenza-nouveau-pailladin|title=Isaac Mbenza nouveou Pailladin|publisher=Montpellier HSC|language=fr|date=30 January 2017|access-date=25 May 2017}} '''Huddersfield Town''' On 9 August 2018, Mbenza moved to [[Premier League]] club [[Huddersfield Town A.F.C.|Huddersfield Town]] on a season-long loan which had the option to become permanent in summer 2019.{{cite news |title=Loan: winger Isaac Mbenza signs! |url=https://www.htafc.com/news/2018/august/loan-winger-isaac-mbenza-signs/ |publisher=Huddersfield Town A.F.C|date=9 August 2018}} ==International career== Mbenza was born in France and is of Congolese descent, and emigrated to Belgium at a young age.{{cite web|url=http://www.sports.cd/2016/12/14/decouverte-isaac-mbenza-belgo-congolais-de-standard-de-liege/|title=Découverte: Isaac Mbenza belgo-congolais de Standard de Liège !|date=14 December 2016|publisher=}}{{cite web|url=https://www.voetbalkrant.com/nl/nieuws/lees/2017-03-26/isaac-mbenza-verkiest-belgie-boven-congo|title=België of Congo: Nationale belofte heeft zijn beslissing gemaakt|date=26 March 2017|publisher=}} ==Career statistics== {{Updated|match played on 2 January 2019}}{{Soccerway |id=312019 |accessdate=11 March
